name: J.B. Field's Thermal Winter Hiker Socks - Unisex
description: Thick thermal wool socks to warm your feet on hiking trips or cold hardwood floors.Made of a soft, non-itchy blend of merino wool, nylon and LYCRA®.Full thermal padding cushions your steps.Wool is pre-shrunk to prevent any surprises after washing.Medium fits men's size 4 to 8, women's 5 to 9. Large fits men's size 8 to 12, women's 9 to 13. Extra-large fits men's size 12 to 16.
